pullrequest.title: Update CommsClient with more general Bind interface

content.raw:
There are a few style errors:

    caguero@bb8:~/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_gazebo$ sh tools/code_check.sh 
    cppcheck: Couldn't open the file: "/tmp/cpp_check.suppress".
    cppcheck: Couldn't open the file: "/tmp/cpp_check.suppress".
    ./include/subt_gazebo/CommsClient.hh:175:  public: should be indented +2 space inside class CommsClient  [whitespace/indent] [3]
    ./include/subt_gazebo/CommsClient.hh:175:  Weird number of spaces at line-start.  Are you using a 2-space indent?  [whitespace/indent] [3]
    ./include/subt_gazebo/CommsClient.hh:176:  Weird number of spaces at line-start.  Are you using a 2-space indent?  [whitespace/indent] [3]
    ./include/subt_gazebo/CommsClient.hh:185:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
    ./include/subt_gazebo/CommsClient.hh:186:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
    Total errors found: 5
